pullRequest.title: (CDAP-16676) Upgrade dataproc API v1->v1beta2 and add option to enable component gateway
pullRequest.bodyText:
Why:
One of the new features in v1beta2 API is allowing enabling dataproc
component gateway which allowing accesses to hadoop web UI, thereby
faciliating debugging.
What:

Upgrade to use v1beta2 instead of v1
Add an option to enable component gateway, default is off.

Usage:
Adding the following to cdap-site.xml
provisioner.system.properties.gcp-dataproc.componentGatewayEnabled: "true"

nodes.bodyText: No need to call getOrDefault. just call get is ok. Boolean.parseBoolean will return false for null.

(CDAP-16676) Upgrade dataproc API v1->v1beta2 and add option to enable component gateway

Why:
One of the new features in v1beta2 API is allowing enabling dataproc
component gateway which allowing accesses to hadoop web UI, thereby
faciliating debugging.

What:
- Upgrade to use v1beta2 instead of v1
- Add an option to enable component gateway, default is off.

Usage:
Adding the following to cdap-site.xml

nodes.bodyText: For true/false, better to use toggle type. See https://github.com/cdapio/hydrator-plugins/blob/develop/core-plugins/widgets/File-batchsource.json#L52 for example.
